text: musa(mose)ga geuui salamdeul-eul wihae mul-eul yocheonghayeossgo ie naega malhagil “geudaeui jipang-ilo bawileul ttaelila.” geuleoni geugos-eseo yeol dugaeui umul-i sos-aoleudeola. modeun salamdeul-i geudeul-ui mul masil gos-eul al-assnola. “geudaedeul-eun hananim-ui yangsig-eulo meoggo masidoe, daejieseo haeag-eul peotteulimyeonseo pyehaeleul kkichiji malla.”
